com.cognifide.slice.core.internal.adapter

Class AdapterFactoryManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cognifide.slice.core.internal.adapter.AdapterFactoryManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InjectorLifecycleListener, EventListener, org.osgi.framework.BundleListener

    @Service(value=InjectorLifecycleListener.class)
public class AdapterFactoryManager
extends Object
implements InjectorLifecycleListener, org.osgi.framework.BundleListener
    This component is responsible for creation and destruction of the AdapterFactory services. Every time a injector is created, it looks for all classes annotated with SliceResource annotation and creates a separate AdapterFactory for each bundle containing matching classes.
    Each time a bundle is restarted, corresponding AdapterFactory is updated with the most recent list of adapters.
    Author:
    Tomasz Rękawek, Dominik Kornaś
